result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ryan L. Lunzmann

records.addlTxt: Plea hearing on November 10, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Ryan L. Lunzmann appeared by video, in custody @ MCJ.  Attorney William Reabe in court for Ryan L. Lunzmann.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
3:25 p.m.
Court calls 22CF52, 22CF68 and 22CF227.
Atty Reabe heard - Prelim already waived as to 22CF52 and 22CF68.
As to 22CF227:
Prelim Questionnaire/Waiver filed.
Court finds Deft freely waives prelim.
Deft bound over for trial.
Ready to proceed to Arraignment as to 22CF227 - arraignments already held on 22CF52 and 22CF68
ADA heard - Information tracks Complaint and has been sent to efiling.
Atty Reabe waives reading.
Enters not guilty pleas.
All three cases scheduled for STC.
3:31 p.m.
Status conference scheduled for January 23, 2023 at 10:55 am.

8:34 AM Defendant Ryan L. Lunzmann appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney William Reabe in court for Ryan L. Lunzmann.  Attorney DeShea Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls cases 22CF52, 22CF68, and 22CF227.
Atty Reabe heard - does not currently represent on 22CF227.
Deft has contacted the PD office, but does not qualify.
Atty Reabe currently represent as a Dean Atty on the other 2 case and is willing to on 227 also.
Court appoints Atty Reabe.
Atty Reabe to prepare an order for an additional $50 per month toward dean fees on the 227 case.
Atty Reabe requests prelim within time limits on all cases.
DA heard on courts schedules.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
8:39 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Arraignment scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

1:32 PM Defendant Ryan L. Lunzmann appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney William Reabe in court for Ryan L. Lunzmann. 
Court calls cases 22CF52 and 22CF68.
Atty Reabe heard - looking for treatment options, and just advised of new discovery.
ADA heard - there is also a new pending case.
Atty Reabe requests status in 30-45 days.
ADA no objection.
Court schedules with parties.
1:35 PM
Status conference scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

3:18 PM Prosecuting attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ryan L. Lunzmann appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney William Reabe in court for Ryan L. Lunzmann. 
W/22CF68
Copy of info
Waives reading
Pleads n/g
Requests STC 
3:21
Status conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:37 PM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ryan L. Lunzmann appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney William Reabe in court for Ryan L. Lunzmann. 
w/22CF52 & 22CF68
Prelim quest/WOR provided - Atty Reabe satisfied.
Def waives prelim
Court finds def freely waives prelim
Def bound over for trial 
Court schedules w/parties.
3:40 pm
Arraignment scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

08:52 AM Defendant Ryan L. Lunzmann in court with attorney William Reabe.  Defendant Ryan L. Lunzmann in custody.  Kathryn E Heineck appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ryan L. Lunzmann appeared by video means with Attorney.
.Court calls cases 22CF52 and 22CF68.
Atty Reabe heard - has reviewed complaints with deft.
Deft understands.
Requests prelim within time limits.
Court schedules.
8:52 AM
  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Atty William Reabe appointed as Dean atty - repayment by Deft of $50 per mth comm 4-15-22

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Ltr from JA to Deft regarding Dean atty

09:03 AM Defendant Ryan L. Lunzmann in court, in custody.  DeShea D. Morrow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ryan L. Lunzmann appeared by video means.
Court calls case and appears by ZOOM means.
Deft heard - has not been given a copy of the complaint.
Court reviews charges and max penalties.
Court inquires on atty.
Deft heard - has not contacted the PD's office yet.
Atty Spansail is present and is heard - will meet with the deft today to evaluate him.
Court schedules with parties.
9:06 AM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

11:43 AM Defendant Ryan L. Lunzmann in court with attorney Brad Hansen.  Defendant Ryan L. Lunzmann in custody.  Kathryn E Heineck appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ryan L. Lunzmann appeared by video means.
Court calls case.
Atty Hansen heard - has reviewed complaint with deft.
Deft understands charges and penalties.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Hansen heard.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $250 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx.
Court schedules with parties.
11:48 AM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
